title: Crypto.Games
author: Crypto.Games
content: Dice Giveaway - We're giving away $100 in BTC to player who hits Bet ID 7,777,777,777.Rules- All coins except Playmoney are allowed.- Minimum bet: 1000 satoshi or altcoin equivalent.- Payout must be 2x or more.- To claim reward, player has to report in chat within 5 minutes after hitting the required Bet ID.- If the bet doesn't fit requirements or player doesn't claim reward, rules above will apply to the next eligible bet until we have a winner.More info about Crypto.Games on this thread.Catch the winning spirit!
